ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views

Class EditExpenseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views.EditExpenseActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewInterface

    public class EditExpenseActivity
extends Activity
implements ViewInterface
    Activity takes an expense from the ExpenseListActivity and allows the user to edit information about the expense.
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        Sets the action bar to include the options to change user and take a receipt photo in the dropdown menu.

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Deals with the user pressing on options in the dropdown menu of the action bar.

      • confirmEdit

        Is called when the edit button is clicked. The method checks if everything in the new version of the expense is permitted and accepts and executes the edit if everything is and the claim status permits it to.
        Parameters:
        v - - the current view

      • takeReceiptPhoto

        public void takeReceiptPhoto()
        gets a picture from the user to attach as the receipt for the expense.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the receipt view when called.
        Specified by:
        update in interface ViewInterface

      • editLocation

        public void editLocation(View v)
        Called when edit/view location is clicked. Gives the user multiple options to setting the location such as clearing the current location and setting the location using their device's gps or a map.
        Parameters:
        v - - the current view

      • getToastCount

        public int getToastCount()
        Used for testing
        Returns:
        the number of toasts corresponding with how many views were clicked that aren't allowed to be edited

      • getOptionsMenu

        public Menu getOptionsMenu()
        Used for testing that the camera icon is shown when canEdit is true
        Returns:
        Menu containing the options menu for this activity
